Detailed Description

contains input parameters for deformable mirror fitting.

Field Documentation

double* FIT_CFG_T::thetax

x Coordinate of DM fitting directions.

double* FIT_CFG_T::thetay

y Coordinate of DM fitting directions.

double* FIT_CFG_T::wt

weight of each direction

double FIT_CFG_T::tik_cstr

tikhonov regularization

int FIT_CFG_T::actslave

slaving constraint for non-active actuators.

Useful in CBS method

int FIT_CFG_T::nfit

Number of DM fit directions.

int FIT_CFG_T::lrt_piston

Piston constraint low rank term in fit coefficient matrix.

int FIT_CFG_T::lrt_tt

differential tip/tilt constraint on two DMs or tt on upper dms.

int FIT_CFG_T::alg

Fitting algorithm to solve the linear equation.

0: Cholesky direct solve for the large matrix. (CBS) 1: CG or PCG.

int FIT_CFG_T::precond

Preconditioner.

Not available.

int FIT_CFG_T::maxit

max iterations.

Usually 4 for CG

int FIT_CFG_T::square

using square grid on DM and ploc.
